transcript_chunks.text: armored Core 6 fires of Rubicon again a name that never gets less cool what are you giving on the kind of funny scale this is the first time while reviewing a game at kind of funny that I've played the game twice by the time I've sat down for this review and that is because I [ __ ] love this game for me personally I'm giving this game a 5 out of 5 on the kind of funny scale I think this game is incredible I should mentioned that this is my first armor core game for me during my second playthrough that's where I started to really take things in and really appreciate the story for what it is which is something that is in support of creating the best Mech fantasy that you can imagine and I think that's what armor core 6 does for me that is really special I can't imagine making a Mech game that is as thoughtful about how it wants you to really be in the mech fantasy as this one these guys are really good at creating a really intense boss fight the difficulty is there and once you get past

is as thoughtful about how it wants you to really be in the mech fantasy as this one these guys are really good at creating a really intense boss fight the difficulty is there and once you get past it you have that feeling of overcoming something that you thought you could never get through but at the same time this is the most fresh from software games in years and years and years but I think this definitely lives up into what my expectation is from
